info.name: eDEF  Documentation
info.description: Electronic DEFence File management system (eDEF), is a military Grade API, built to be deployed on an interanet, to send information between departments and individuals. It has two set of endpoints that can either be Administrative or a user. Information are sent as requests between departments and as mail between users. Authentication wise, it utilises JWT bearer authentication. Enrolment on the system is solely controlled by the Administrators.

item.name: user
Manage user

response.name: Get Profile

request.description: Add or edit existing name or rank

item.description: Set of endpoints for editing user information

item.name: Messages

formdata.value: i love you from the bottom of my heart

item.name: Mails
List of Users in this Department

item.description: Messages sent between users of the same department
Set of endpoints for sending and receiving information

item.name: Log

response.name: Request Logs

item.description: Gets a list both incoming and out going requests
List of endpoints accessible to users, this includes, editing user profiles, sending and getting requests and mails, and logs
